title: Job Openings at DreamWorks Global Logistics Limited
content:
DreamWorks Global Logistics Limited - We link manufacturers with numerous customers in over 100 cities and villages across Nigeria, getting their products to them seamlessly and rapidly. We have a precise customer-focused strategy that addresses our customers’ supply chain requirements seamlessly. We know how to deliver!

We are recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the following positions below:

1.) Sales Manager

JobLocation: Lagos Mainland, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	This role requires leadership in managing sales teams, fostering strong customer relationships, leveraging both digital and offline marketing strategies, and ensuring profitability through effective sales and logistics coordination.


Job responsibilities


	Develop and implement comprehensive sales strategies tailored to the logistics sector, focusing on market penetration ,expansion and revenue growth.
	Analyze logistics market trends, customer needs, and competitor activities to refine sales approaches and forecast sales accurately.
	Identify sales leads, pitch products to new clients and maintain a good working relationship with new contacts.
	Partner with marketing to design and execute integrated digital campaigns (SEO, social media, email marketing) and offline initiatives (trade shows, networking events) to generate qualified leads.
	Set clear sales targets and quotas based on market analysis and company objectives.
	Monitor sales pipeline and adjust strategies proactively to ensure targets are met or exceeded.
	Conduct regular performance reviews, provide coaching, and implement training programs to enhance team capabilities and motivation.
	Prepare and present detailed sales performance reports, forecasts, and market insights to senior management.


General Skills Requirements


	A First Degree or post-graduate Diploma in Marketing, Accounting, Business Administration or a related discipline
	Minimum of 3 years of sales experience, preferably with relevant experience in the Logistics industry
	The ability and desire to sell.
	A positive, confident, and determined approach.
	Familiarity with product and sales analysis
	Proficiency in all Microsoft Office applications.


Salary
N350,000 - N400,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: dglhrexecutive@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Dispatch Rider

Job Locations: Abuja (FCT) & Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking enthusiastic and reliable Dispatch Riders to join our team.
	In this role, you will be responsible for delivering packages or other items to customers in a timely and efficient manner.
	You will play a crucial role in ensuring customer satisfaction and representing our brand positively.


Key Responsibilities


	Safely operate a motorcycle or other vechicle to deliver items to customers.
	Delivering of items to customers / clients
	Navigate through city streets efficiently to meet delivery deadlines.
	Ensure the accuracy of deliveries by double-checking items before departure.
	Maintain a professional demeanor and provide excellent customer service during interactions.
	Follow safety regulations and traffic laws at all times.
	Keep the delivery vehicle clean and in good working condition.
	Handle cash or digital payment transactions as required.
	Report any issues or delays to management promptly.


Qualifications


	Valid driver's license and/or appropriate certification for the vehicle used.
	Experience in delivery or riding is required.
	Familiarity with local roads and neighborhoods.
	Strong time management skills and the ability to work independently.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	A smartphone with navigation capabilities.


Physical Requirements:


	Ability to lift packages weighing up.
	Prolonged periods of sitting or riding.


Working Conditions:


	Flexible hours, including evenings and weekends.
	Exposure to various weather conditions.


Benefits


	Salary: N70,000 Monthly.
	Competitive pay per delivery or hourly rate.
	Incentives based on performance.
	Instant Health Package like HMO


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: dglhrexecutive@gmail.com using the Job Posiiton as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Sales Executive

Job Locations: Lagos, Benin - Edo & Kano
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a highly motivated and results-driven Sales Executive with a strong background in logistics to join our team.
	This role involves identifying new business opportunities, developing client relationships, and driving revenue growth through the sale of logistics services.
	The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of logistics operations, supply chain management, and transportation solutions, along with excellent sales and communication skills.


Responsibilities


	Generate new leads and identify potential clients in the logistics and transportation sectors.
	Promote the company’s logistics services, including freight forwarding, supply chain solutions, and transportation management.
	Conduct product presentations, demonstrations, and meetings to drive sales and close deals.
	Negotiate contracts and pricing with clients to ensure mutually beneficial agreements.
	Meet or exceed sales targets, KPIs, and revenue goals set by the company.
	Maintain accurate sales records, customer data, and reports in the CRM system.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Logistics, Supply Chain Management, or a related field (preferred).
	Minimum of 2 - 5 years of experience in sales, with at least 2 years in the logistics or transportation industry.
	Active clientelle database.


Skills:


	Strong understanding of logistics, supply chain management, and transportation solutions.
	Proven track record of achieving sales targets and generating new business.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.


Salary
N150,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: dglhrexecutive@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
